   contain the root `toctree` directive.

MLQA Documentation
==================
Welcome to mlqa’s documentation. Get started with `Introduction <source/introduction.html>`_ and then get an overview with the `Quickstart <source/quickstart.html>`_. The rest of the documentation describes each component of MLQA in detail in the `API Reference`_ section.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
